author: @frederickzoreta6617
text: Thanks for sharing your thoughts on these guided projects.  I have been subscribed to Coursera Plus since May. I really like most of their guided projects.  When I saw this video 4 hours ago, I immediately did the Power BI for HR Analytics. After finishing it, I also did the 'Income Statement / Balance Sheet' with that same instructor. That 2nd course also includes 2 optional dashboard projects.  So in a little less than 2 hours, I created not 2, but 4 PBI dashboards and have also downloaded his data sets.  I'd HIGHLY RECOMMEND to anyone who wants to further build their portfolio ( like yours truly). :)  ** The instructor for these PBI projects also encourages the student to log in their emails using their cloud desktop so that you can submit those exact projects to potential employers/ clients.
